quotes.quote: Be killing sin or it will be killing you.
Sin is absence of God. Nothing more, nothing less.
The wages of sin are death, but by the time taxes are taken out, it's just sort of a tired feeling.
Sin is its own punishment, devouring you from the inside.
Hate the sin, love the sinner.
A large part of mankind is angry not with the sins, but with the sinners.
Love the sinner and hate the sin.
There is no original sin. You don't have to pay repentance to anything or anybody.
The Lord does not forgive excuses, He forgives sin.
The first sin in our universe was Lucifer's self conceit.
It is perilously easy to have amazing sympathy with God's truth and remain in sin.
Sin is too stupid to see beyond itself.
You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit.
Personal sin reflected upon breeds compassion.
I'd rather laugh with the sinners than cry with the saints.
Every sin is the distortion of an energy breathed into us.
Few love to hear the sins they love to act.
Sin is looking for the right thing in the wrong place.
Sin is the failure of a fallible creature, and reversible by repentance.
Counting other people's sins does not make you a saint.
Be a sinner and sin boldly, but believe and rejoice in Christ even more boldly.
We sinned for no reason but an incomprehensible lack of love, and He saved us for no reason but an incomprehensible excess of love.
I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
If you are going to sin, sin against God, not the bureaucracy. God will forgive you but the bureaucracy won't.
Sin brought death, and death will disappear with the disappearance of sin.
And sin, young man, is when you treat people like things.
No one was ever scolded out of their sins.
For any sin, we all suffer. That is why our suffering is endless.
A sin is wrong not because it makes you feel bad though it should but because it is wrong.
Sin cannot tear you away from him (Christ) even though you commit adultery a hundred times a day and commit as many murders.
